title: Software Developer
description: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, MySQL, APIs, etc.

title: Product Designer
description: Design intuitive, clean interfaces and experiences.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Help with deployment pipelines, Netlify, GitHub Actions, hosting infrastructure.

title: Data Analyst
description: Track and visualize data on Stoa participation, site traffic, and global reach.

title: Accessibility Advocate
description: Ensure compliance with WCAG 2.1+ and accessibility best practices.

title: Network Ambassador
description: Promote initiatives across the Stoic Fellowship Network.

title: Stoa Ambassador
description: Support the creation and sustainability of Stoic groups worldwide.

title: New Stoa Mentor
description: Onboard and guide new Stoa organizers.

title: Community Manager
description: Foster discussion, connection, and collaboration online and in-person.

title: Moderator
description: Maintain quality discourse in forums, chat groups, or comments.

title: Event Coordinator
description: Plan and execute local or global events like Stoicon-X.

title: Volunteer Coordinator
description: Organize, track, and support volunteer participation.

title: Fundraising Specialist
description: Design and run fundraising campaigns.

title: Grant Writer
description: Apply for funding and partnership opportunities.

title: Donor Relations
description: Build long-term relationships with supporters.

title: Board Member
description: Help lead the strategic and ethical direction of the organization.

title: Head of Marketing
description: Oversee branding, campaigns, and digital strategy.

title: PR Manager
description: Manage press relationships and external communications.

title: Social Media Manager
description: Engage the community and share Stoic wisdom across platforms.

title: Newsletter Editor
description: Curate monthly updates, quotes, and member highlights.

title: Curriculum Developer
description: Design study guides, practice paths, and Stoic lesson plans.

title: Blog Writer
description: Contribute essays, interviews, and reflective pieces.

title: Quote Curator
description: Verify and categorize quotes from ancient and modern Stoics.

title: Translator
description: Make TSF content accessible to global audiences.

title: Graphic Designer
description: Create visuals for web, social, and events.

title: Brand Strategist
description: Maintain a consistent visual and verbal identity.

title: Photographer
description: Capture events, people, and stories.

title: Video Editor / Content Creator
description: Produce and edit educational or promotional video content.

title: Lawyer
description: Assist with governance, contracts, or nonprofit compliance.

title: General Contributor
description: No specific expertise required — just a passion for Stoicism!
